item.title: Private credit: what critics miss and what founders need to know
item.description: The critiques of private credit too often focus on headlines and hypotheticals, rather than on structure, incentives, and outcomes.

item.title: Job hugging. Quiet cracking. Rage applying. Are these buzzwords helping — or hurting — the workplace?
item.description: I'm Aflac's head of HR and worked in the industry for over two decades, and I've never seen workplace terminology evolve this quickly.

item.title: AI is gobbling our personal data—but new advances in blockchain can stop that
item.description: Blockchain's growing ability to verify our identity and actions mean we don't have to rely on corporate AI tools.
